meanings.definition: Of or relating to the jaw
meanings.sent1: The gnathic bone supports the lower teeth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist studied the gnathic structure of the patient's jaw.
meanings.sent3: The gnathic alignment of the skull made the skeleton look unique.
meanings.sent4: Her gnathic profile resembled that of a determined athlete.
meanings.sent5: The gnathic shape of the jawbone was crucial for chewing food.

meanings.definition: Having a prominent or projecting jaw
meanings.sent1: The actor's gnathic appearance added to his rugged charm.
meanings.sent2: The lion's gnathic features made it look powerful and majestic.
meanings.sent3: The gnathic jawline of the cartoon character made kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her gnathic jaw jutted out like a cliff over the sea.
meanings.sent5: The gnathic structure of the mask gave it a fierce look.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a strong or prominent chin
meanings.sent1: His gnathic chin gave him a distinguished look.
meanings.sent2: The model's gnathic profile was perfect for the magazine cover.
meanings.sent3: The gnathic chin of the statue made it seem wise and noble.
meanings.sent4: Her gnathic feature was her most striking facial characteristic.
meanings.sent5: The gnathic strength of his chin showed determination and resilience.
